question: When a person memorizes the quran..he can take 10 to Jannah..what if he wants non muslim to go with him..
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The general rule is that a non-Muslim will not be granted entrance into Jannah. That is a place only for Muslims.

A Hafiz will be able to intercede only for such Muslims upon whom Jahannum (fire of hell) has become compulsory on him/her.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
